transcript: whenever you give you deposit Goodwill into the audience and it basically precedes reciprocity because if you give someone something first they're far more likely to comply with your request later and so the idea is that you force people to get favors from you that later when you do make an Ask many people feel obligated just through social construct to comply but with media we can do that at scale you can gain Goodwill and provide value to millions of people at once but then it all funnels back to one person and that's why it's so powerful
